attributes.documentation:
@dev Cancels a trade by the poster.
@param _trade The trade to be cancelled.
attributes.name: cancelTrade

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Trade can be cancelled only by poster."

attributes.type: literal_string "Trade can be cancelled only by poster."
attributes.value: Trade can be cancelled only by poster.

cancelTrade(uint256).details: Cancels a trade by the poster.

executeTrade(uint256).details: Executes a trade. Must have approved this contract to transfer the amount of currency specified to the poster. Transfers ownership of the item to the filler.

params._trade: The id of an existing trade

getTrade(uint256).details: Returns the details for a trade.

openTrade(uint256,uint256).details: Opens a new trade. Puts _item in escrow.

params._item: The id for the item to trade.
params._price: The amount of currency for which to trade the item.

userdoc.notice: Implements the classifieds board market. The market will be governed by an ERC20 token as currency, and an ERC721 token that represents the ownership of the items being traded. Only ads for selling items are implemented. The item tokenization is responsibility of the ERC721 contract which should encode any item details.
